skills.name: Veteran Fighter (百戦練磨)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is hit by a [Torpedo Salvo], and if Blücher has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining: change all torpedo's target to Blucher:
Blucher takes all torpedo damage during that salvo. Can only proc once per battle.
2. When in any damaged state, Crit Rate increased by 25%.
3. When in any damaged state, all offensive capabilities stay fully operational.

skills.name: Ammo Gift (火器御礼)
skills.text:
1. Reduces incoming [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.
2. When entering a battle, obtains a shield with 20% of Max HP that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.
3. Whenever Blucher is Heavily Damaged, a random ally that can arm torpedo will have a 100% chance of getting 1 additional torpedo. Proc up to 3 times per battle.
